metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19105 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
LibreCAD 2.1.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(0x89C04589 write access violation and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

librecad - 2.1.3-1.1
librecad-data - 2.1.3-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librecad package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-1.1').
